Interface PermissionAccess

  • All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface PermissionAccess

    • Method Detail

      • allowedAction

        default boolean allowedAction(RequestContent content,
                              RoleType... roles)
        Check by role if user is allowed to perform this action
        Parameters:
        content - request content
        roles - roles of users who are allowed to perform this action
        Returns:
        true - allowed
        false - otherwise

      • allowedAction

        default boolean allowedAction(RequestContent content,
                              java.lang.String... users)
        Check by login if user is allowed to perform this action
        Parameters:
        content - request content
        users - logins of users who are allowed to perform this action
        Returns:
        true - allowed
        false - otherwise

        Returns:

        false - otherwise
